T02ratnakeu:186: mahākālavāyubhiś colkāpātaiś ca sumeruṃ parvatarājānaṃ pāṇibhiḥ parājaghnuḥ /
T02ratnakeu:189: yato nāgā mahānāgāḥ yato yakṣā mahāyakṣāḥ sarvāvantyā mahāpṛthivyāḥ sagiriśailaparvatāyāḥ sumeroś ca parvatarājñaḥ kaṃpaṃ viditvā sarasāṃ mahāsarasāṃ nadīkunadīmahānadīnāṃ mahāsamudrāṇāṃ ca saṃkṣobhaṃ jñātvā gaganatale tasthuḥ /
T02ratnakeu:190: sā ca māraparṣat sumerumūrdhani sthitvā yojanapramāṇāṃ vṛṣṭim abhinirmimīyāṃgamagadheṣu samutsasarja
T02ratnakeu:192: atha bhagavāṃś tasmin samaye māramaṇḍalavidhvaṃsanaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpade /
T02ratnakeu:195: yad uta buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ pāramitāśabdaṃ abhijñāśabdaṃ avaivartikaśabdaṃ abhiṣekaśabdaṃ caturmāraparājayaśabdaṃ bodhimaṇḍopasaṃkramaṇaśabdaṃ yāvat sopādānanirupādānaśabdān adhyatiṣṭhat // sarvā rajondhakāravāyavaḥ praśemuḥ /
T02ratnakeu:196: ye kecid iha cāturdvīpike tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatikṣitiśailaparvatās tān sarvān saptaratnamayān adhyatiṣṭhat //
T02ratnakeu:197: anavalokyamūrdhno bhagavān yāvad brahmalokaṃ kāyena vaśaṃ vartayām āsa /
T02ratnakeu:198: ekaikasmāc ca lakṣaṇād bhagavatas tādṛśī prabhā niścacāra yayā prabhayā tṛsāhasramahāsāhasrī lokadhātur udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭo 'bhūt /
T02ratnakeu:199: ye cāsyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragapretapiśācakumbhāṇḍamanuṣyāmanuṣyā nairayikā vā tairyagyonikā vā yāmalaukikā vā te sarve bhagavaṃtam adrākṣuḥ /
T02ratnakeu:200: bahūni ca devanāgayakṣamanuṣyāmanuṣyaśatasahasrāṇi gaganasthāḥ puṣpair avakīrya pradakṣiṇaṃ cakruḥ stuvaṃto namaś cakruḥ /
T02ratnakeu:202: pūrvāvaropitakuśalamūlam anusmṛtya namo buddhāyeti kṛtvā tebhyo (Kurumiya 19) 'pāyebhyaś cavitvā deveṣūpapannāḥ //
T02ratnakeu:203: tataś ca mārasainyā dvāviṃśatimāraputraśatasahasrāṇi sagaṇapārṣadyāni bhagavata evaṃrūpaṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavato 'ntike 'tīva prasādaṃ pratilabdhvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopajagmuḥ upetya sārdhaṃ taiḥ paṃcabhir mārakanyāśatair bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandyāṃjalīn pragṛhyābhir gāthābhir adhibhāṣaṃte sma //
T02ratnakeu:205: vitatya lokaṃ yaśasā vibhāsi tvām eva nāthaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmaḥ // RKP_1.34
T02ratnakeu:206: praṇaṣṭamārge vinimīlitākṣe ulkāyase tvaṃ jagatīva sūryaḥ /
T02ratnakeu:207: aparājitaprāṇabhṛd ekabandho tvāṃ sārthavāhaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmaḥ // RKP_1.35
T02ratnakeu:212: maitrāvihārī paramavidhijña karuṇāvihārīṃś charaṇam vrajāmaḥ // RKP_1.37
T02ratnakeu:214: ajñānarugnāśaka lokanātha tvāṃ vaidyarājaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmaḥ // RKP_1.38
T02ratnakeu:216: sanmārgasandarśaka lokabandho kṛpānvitaṃ tvām iha pūjayāmaḥ // RKP_1.39
T02ratnakeu:217: kṣamyāmahe tvāṃ vayam agrabudddhim āsaṃ praduṣṭās tvayi yad vayaṃ tu /
T02ratnakeu:218: tam atyayaṃ vīra gṛhāṇa nātha tvam ekabandhur jagati pradhānaḥ // RKP_1.40
T02ratnakeu:219: vayaṃ samutsṛjya hi mārapakṣam utpādayāmo varabodhicittam nimaṃtrayāmaḥ kila sarvasattvān (Kurumiya 21) bodhiṃ labhemo vayam
T02ratnakeu:221: nidarśayāsmākam udāracaryāṃ yathā vayaṃ pāramitāś carema /
T02ratnakeu:222: ananyavādaiḥ katibhis tu dharmaiḥ samanvitā bodhim avāpnuvaṃti // RKP_1.42
T02ratnakeu:223: puṣpāṇi yat te 'bhimukhaṃ kṣipāmaś chatrāṇi tāny eva tu sarvadikṣu /
T02ratnakeu:224: tiṣṭhaṃtu mūrdhni dvipadottamānāṃ kṣetreṣu sarvartusukhākareṣu // RKP_1.43
T02ratnakeu:225: atha khalu te sarve māraputrā mārakanyāḥ sagaṇapārṣadyā bhagavantaṃ muktakusumair abhyavākiran
T02ratnakeu:226: tāni ca muktakusumāni bhagavata riddhyanubhāvenānekāni koṭīniyutasahasrāṇi gaṃgānadīvālukādhikāni puṣpacchatrāṇi saṃtiṣṭhaṃte sma /
T02ratnakeu:227: tāni puṣpacchatrāṇi daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhānāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ yāpayatāṃ mūrdhasandhāv upary antarīkṣe tasthuḥ /
T02ratnakeu:228: svayaṃ ca tā mārakanyāḥ sagaṇapārṣadyāḥ adrākṣuḥ /
T02ratnakeu:229: daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣv asaṃkhyeyeṣv (Kurumiya 22) aprameyeṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ yāpayatāṃ dharmaṃ deśayatāṃ pariṣadā parivṛtānāṃ bhāṣatāṃ tapatāṃ virocatāṃ sanniṣaṇṇānāṃ tāni puṣpacchatrāṇy upary antarīkṣe mūrdhasandhau saṃsthitāni /
T02ratnakeu:230: te ca buddhā bhagavantaḥ samavarṇāḥ samaliṃgāḥ samarūpāḥ samadarśanāḥ /
T02ratnakeu:231: kevalaṃ teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ siṃhāsananānātvaṃ pariṣadānānātvaṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhanānātvaṃ dadṛśuḥ /
T02ratnakeu:232: te ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ svaramaṇḍalapādavyāhāram aśrauṣuḥ /
T02ratnakeu:233: sā ca māraparṣad bhagavato 'nubhāvenaivaṃrūpaṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaprītiprasādajātā bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhir vanditvā purato niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya //
T02ratnakeu:234: atha khalu teṣāṃ māraputrāṇāṃ sagaṇapārṣadyānāṃ daśabiṃbarāṇi pratinivartya mārabhavane evaṃ vṛttāntaṃ mārāya pāpīmate vistareṇāvocann iti /
T02ratnakeu:235: ekaromakūpam api vayaṃ tasya śravaṇasya gautamasya na śaktā vidhvaṃsayitum iti // bhūyaś ca viṃśatisahasrāṇi tam eva śaraṇaṃ jagmuḥ tasyaiva cāgrato niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya //
T02ratnakeu:236: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīmān bhūyasyā mātrayā caṇḍībhūto duḥkhito durmanā vipratisāry evam āha
T02ratnakeu:237: lakṣmī gatā mama punar na paraiti tāvad yāvat kṛto 'sya na + śākyasutasya nāśaḥ (Kurumiya
T02ratnakeu:238: tūṣṇīṃ sthitā vayam ananyamanaḥpratarkāḥ śākyātmajaṃ kathaṃ im'; adya tu ghātayema // RKP_1.44
T02ratnakeu:239: atha māraḥ pāpīmān durmanaska eva śokāgāre niṣaṇṇaḥ //
T02ratnakeu:242: atha tā mārakanyā māraputrāś ca sagaṇapāriṣadyā bhagavantam evam āhuḥ /
T02ratnakeu:243: arthikā vayaṃ bhagavann anenaivaṃrūpeṇa yānena ca jñānena ca riddhyā kṛpayopāyena pratibhānena ca āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad upāyajñānasamanvāgatas tathāgataḥ /
T02ratnakeu:244: katamair bhagavan dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ puruṣapudgalo na ca pāpamitrahastaṃ gacchati /
T02ratnakeu:245: kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate // bhagavān āha /
T02ratnakeu:246: caturbhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ kulaputrā ihaikatyapuruṣapudgalo na pāpamitrahastaṃ gacchati
T02ratnakeu:249: iha bhadramukhāḥ kulaputraḥ sarvadharmān na parāmārṣṭi /
T02ratnakeu:250: na ca kvacid dharmam udgṛhṇāti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati na kalpayati na vikalpayati yad uta dānapāramitāyāṃ caran na dānaphalaṃ riñcati nodgṛhṇāti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati na kalpayati na vikalpayati yāvat prajñāpāramitāyām api caran yāvan na kalpayati na vikalpayati //
T02ratnakeu:251: punar aparaṃ bhadramukhāḥ sa kulaputro na sattvavādī bhavati na jīvavādī na poṣavādī (Kurumiya 25) na pudgalavādī na sattvadhātuṃ manasā parāmārṣṭi
T02ratnakeu:253: punar aparaṃ bhadramukhāḥ sa kulaputro na rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyāni parāmārṣṭi yāvan na kalpayati na vikalpayati //
T02ratnakeu:254: punar aparaṃ bhadramukhāḥ sa kulaputraḥ sarvatryadhvatraidhātukaskandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ hetupratyālaṃbanaphalavipākasamutthānāśrayotpādān na parāmārṣṭi yāvan na kalpayati na vikalpayati //
T02ratnakeu:256: sarvajñajñānaṃ sarvacaryādhiṣṭhānaviṣayakalpavikalparahitam anupalambhayogena ca kartavyaṃ // abhāvā bhadramukhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ
T02ratnakeu:257: sarvajñatā ca yāvad aghoṣānimittānakṣarāpraṇihitānutpādānirodhālakṣaṇāsaṃgānupalaṃbhanādarśanā viviktā nirātmā alakṣaṇāpagatākṣaṇavyupaśāntā atamānālokāsthānāviṣayānīśvarāpakṣāpratipakṣā acintyānāhārāmatsarāprapañcārajāvirajaniravayavā niṣkiṃcanākārakāvedakānāśrayāgrāhyāvijñaptikāpratibhāsākṣaṇikā bhadramukhāḥ sarvajñatā gaganasamā
T02ratnakeu:259: (Kurumiya 26) cartavyāḥ // ebhir bhadramukhāś caturbhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ puruṣapudgalo na pāpamitrahastaṃ gacchati /
T02ratnakeu:261: yaḥ kaścid bhadramukhāḥ sarvaviṣayasaṃgasamucchrayalakṣaṇādhiṣṭhānavyavacāreṇa sarvajñajñānaṃ paryeṣate sa dvayasakto bhavati /
T02ratnakeu:264: yat skandhadhātvāyatanāni lakṣaṇavyavacāreṇādhitiṣṭhati parāmārṣṭi dvayam etad visaṃvādayati sarvajñatāḥ /
T02ratnakeu:270: yo 'pi pārāpārohāpohān adhitiṣṭhati kalpayati dvayam etat /
T02ratnakeu:271: yaḥ kaścid bhadramukhāḥ sarvajñajñānaṃ paryeṣate puruṣapudgalaḥ sa tryadhvāhaṃkāramamakārasamudayanirodhavyavacāram adhitiṣṭhati kalpayati vikalpayati parāmārṣṭi tasya dvayam etat sarvajñajñāne // tadyathā kaścit puruṣaḥ (Kurumiya 27) agnyarthiko bhūtalaṃ parāmṛśet pānārthiko 'gniṃ
T02ratnakeu:272: bhojanārthikaḥ pāṣāṇaṃ puṣpārthikaś cīvaraṃ gandhārthiko manuṣyakuṇapaṃ vastrārthiko 'śmānaṃ vilepanārthika ākāśaṃ parāmṛśet /
T02ratnakeu:273: evam eva bhadramukhāḥ yaś caryādhiṣṭhānasaṃgavyavacārasamucchrayadvayādhiṣṭhānena sarvajñajñānaṃ paryeṣate niṣphalas tasya vyāyāmaḥ //
T02ratnakeu:274: atha khalu tasyām eva pariṣadi dhāraṇamatir nāma bodhisattvaḥ sannipatito
T02ratnakeu:276: sa yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjaliṃ praṇāmyaivam āha /
T02ratnakeu:280: tena hi kulaputra tvām eva pravakṣyāmi /
T02ratnakeu:283: āha yady astīti vakṣyāmi śāśvato bhaviṣyati /
T02ratnakeu:285: madhyamā ca pratipan nopalabhyate // nāsāv asti nāpi nāstīti /
T02ratnakeu:288: yatra bhagavan nāgatir na gatir ity evaṃ jñānāvatārakauśalam eṣa evābhisaṃbodhaḥ //
T02ratnakeu:290: yatra bhagavan na prāptilakṣaṇaṃ nāprāptilakṣaṇaṃ nābhisamayo na sākṣātkṛyā na śamo na praśamo na tryadhvaṃ na (Kurumiya 28) triyānaṃ na praṇidhisāmīcīmanyanā eṣa evābhisaṃbodhaḥ //
T02ratnakeu:292: yo bhagavan na traidhātukaṃ na trīṇi saṃyojanāni na traividyatāṃ na tṛyānatāṃ na skandhadhātvāyatanāni na kalpayati na vikalpayati na hāniṃ na vṛddhiṃ na sāmīcīkaroty eṣa evābhisaṃbodhaḥ //
T02ratnakeu:294: yaḥ pṛthagjanadharmān āryadharmāñ chaikṣadharmān aśaikṣadharmāñ ca śrāvakadharmāñ ca pratyekabuddhadharmān na kalpayati na vikalpayati na sāmīcīkaroty eṣa evābhisaṃbodhaḥ //
T02ratnakeu:296: yo vivekanayena tathatāṃ vyavacārayati eṣa evābhisaṃbodhaḥ //
T02ratnakeu:298: yo 'nutpādalakṣanaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ ca prāptaye cābhisamayāya na kalpayaty eṣa evābhisaṃbodhaḥ
T02ratnakeu:300: yas traidhātukavyavacāraḥ cittam eva citte praveśayaty ubhe citte cittena vyavacārya nopalabhate eṣa evābhisaṃbodhaḥ //
T02ratnakeu:302: yaḥ sarvadharmeṣu na sajyate nānunīyate (Kurumiya 29) nopekṣate na pratihanyate na spṛhayate na muhyate na gṛhṇāti
T02ratnakeu:305: yaḥ puṇyapāpayor na sajjate gaṃbhīrakṣāṃtinayāvatāreṇāhaṃkāramamakārān na kalpayaty eṣa evābhisaṃbodhaḥ
T02ratnakeu:307: yo dagacandrasamān sarvadharmān na prajānīte na ca dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvam ācayaṃ cāpacayaṃ vā paśyaty eṣa evābhisaṃbodhaḥ //
T02ratnakeu:309: yasya sarvatamālokotpādavyayotkarṣāpacayaś cittacaitasikeṣu na pravartaṃta eṣa evābhisaṃbodhaḥ
T02ratnakeu:313: yas trimaṇḍalapariśuddhyā pāramitāsv abhyāsaṃ karoty anupalaṃbhayogena na rajyate na virajyata eṣa evābhisaṃbodhaḥ //
T02ratnakeu:315: yo bhagavan sarvadharmeṣu na rajyate na virajyate gaṃbhīradharmanayaṃ ca prajānāti /
T02ratnakeu:316: yac ca prajānāti tan nāyūhati na niryūhati nākarṣati na vikarṣati na ca kasyacid dharmasyopacayaṃ
T02ratnakeu:317: (Kurumiya 30) vāpacayaṃ vā vidyāṃ vā vimuktiṃ votpādayati vyayaṃ vā hāniṃ
T02ratnakeu:318: vā vṛddhiṃ vā vastuṣu na saṃkliṣyate 'vikalpanataḥ eṣa evābhisaṃbodhaḥ //
T02ratnakeu:321: kiṃ maṃjuśrīr āyogaprayogena prayojanaṃ yad anenaikanayatathathāpraveśenaivaṃ gaṃbhīraśūnyatābhāvanānayena sarvajñañānaparijñānaṃ //
T02ratnakeu:348: evam etan maṃjuśrīr yadā imaṃ gaṃbhīraṃ dharmanayam avabudhyate tadā na kaṃcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati yo dharmo deśyeta yasmai deśyeta yair vārthapadavyaṃjanair deśyeta prakāśyeta /
T02ratnakeu:349: yaṃ vā punaḥ prajahyād yaṃ vā bhāvayed yaṃ vā parijānīyāt /
T02ratnakeu:350: sarvadharmānabhilāpyayogena tathatāṃ praviśati yaḥ sarvajñajñānam avabudhyate //
T02ratnakeu:352: sādhu sādhu kulaputra subhāṣitas te 'yam ekanayena sarvajñajñānapratilābhaḥ /
T02ratnakeu:353: tat kutaḥ sarvadharmā hy asamāropāḥ anutpādāvināśakoṭīkāḥ /
T02ratnakeu:362: asmin khalu punaḥ sarvajñajñānapratilābhavyākaraṇe bhāṣyamāṇe viṃśatibhir mārakanyāmāraputragaṇapārṣadyasahasrair anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilābdhā /
T02ratnakeu:363: audārikaṃ ca kāyaṃ vijahya manamayaṃ kāyaṃ pratilebhire /
T02ratnakeu:365: dvinavatīnāṃ ca devamanuṣyabiṃbarāṇāṃ vicitravicitrāṇāṃ ca bodhisattvakṣāntisamādhidhāraṇīnāṃ pratilābho 'bhūt //
T02ratnakeu:366: atha tāni viṃśatisahasrāṇy anutpattikadharmakṣāṃtipratilabdhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ bhagavantaṃ divyaiḥ puṣpair abhyavakiraṃty abhiprakiraṃti sma /
T02ratnakeu:367: bhagavataś ca pādau śirobhir abhivandyaivam āhuḥ /
T02ratnakeu:368: paśya bhagavann akalyāṇamitrasaṃsargavaśena sattvānāṃ sarvapuṇyopacayakuśalamūlāny (Kurumiya 33) amanasikārāṇi bhavanti /
T02ratnakeu:371: kautūhalaprāptānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ bhagavān saṃśayachittyartham imaṃ pūrvayogam udājahāra //
T02ratnakeu:373: asyām eva cāturdvīpikāyāṃ lokadhātau yadāsīt tena kālena tena samayena dyutindhare mahākalpe vartamāne aṣṭāṣaṣṭivarṣasahasrāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ tena ca kālena tena samayena jyotiḥsomyagandhāvabhāsaśrīr nāma tathāgato 'bhūt vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān /
T02ratnakeu:374: kliṣṭe paṃcakaṣāye loke vartamāne catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ triyānapratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
T02ratnakeu:376: tena khalu punaḥ samayena rājābhūd utpalavaktro nāma caturdvīpeśvaraḥ cakravartī /
T02ratnakeu:377: atha rājā utpalavaktro 'pareṇa kālasamayena sāntaḥpuraparivāraḥ sabalakāyo yena jyotiḥsomyagandhāvabhāsaśrīs tathāgatas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau
T02ratnakeu:379: nānāvādyair nānāgandhair nānādhūpaiś ca pūjāṃ kṛtvā tripradakṣiṇīkṛtvā bhagavataḥ bhikṣusaṃghasya pādau śirasābhivandyābhyāṃ gāthābhyām abhyaṣṭāvit // //
T02ratnakeu:381: dhanasaptakena hitakṛj jagato vada kena sūkṣmamatimān bhavati // RKP_2.1
T02ratnakeu:384: jagatas tv apāyapathavārayitā vada kena mucyat'; iha mārapathā // RKP_2.2
T02ratnakeu:385: atha khalu kulaputra sa jyotiḥsomyagandhāvabhāsaśrīs tathāgato rājānam utpalavaktram etad avocat // tṛbhiḥ satpuruṣa dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ sūkṣmamatir bhavati /

T02ratnakeu:820: saṃkalpamātrajanito vata jīvaloko ratnatrayaṃ hi śaraṇaṃ varadaṃ vrajāmaḥ // RKP_3.49
T02ratnakeu:822: sarve te paṃcāśan mārakumārakāḥ āyuṣmataḥ pūrṇasya pādau śirasābhivandya vīthīmadhye tasya purato niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya //
T02ratnakeu:823: tena ca samayenāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ paścimena nagaradvāreṇa rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ piṇḍāya prāviśat
T02ratnakeu:824: tatra ca nagaradvāre paṃcāśan mārakumārakāḥ paramayauvanasurūpā mahātmaputraveṣadhāriṇo nṛtyaṃto gāyanto viceruḥ /
T02ratnakeu:825: ta āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ gṛhya vīthyāṃ dhāvanta āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim evam āhuḥ /
T02ratnakeu:828: śṛṇuta mārṣā yūyam aśrutapūrvāṃ gītikāṃ śrāvayiṣyāmi /
T02ratnakeu:831: anitya sarvabhāva māyabudbudopama anityam asti saṃskṛte kvacic calātmake /
T02ratnakeu:832: yathā marīci dṛṣṭanaṣṭa nāsti tatra śāśvataṃ laghuvyayā hi sarvadharma buddhimān prajānate (Kurumiya 69)
T02ratnakeu:833: sarvasparśa duḥkhabhāra vedanā nirātmikā yatra prasakta sarvabāla duḥkhadharmapīḍitā /
T02ratnakeu:834: mitraṃ na kaścid asti sarvaduḥkhamocaka yathā hi śraddha bodhimārga bhāvanā ca sevitā // RKP_3.51
T02ratnakeu:835: ekalakṣa sarvadharma saṃjñavarjitāḥ śubhā nirātmayoga sarvacarya 'dravyalakṣaṇātmikā /
T02ratnakeu:836: na jīvapoṣa pudgalo 'pi kārako na vidyate
T02ratnakeu:837: tyajitva māraśāṭhya bodhi citta nāmaye // RKP_3.52
T02ratnakeu:840: yoniśo nirīkṣa kiṃcid asti naiva dravyataḥ saṃmohito hi bālavargu yaṃtravat pravartate //

T02ratnakeu:843: amohadharmataiṣa ukta bodhimārgacārikā nayāhi nāyakena bodhi prāpta tāyina // RKP_3.54
T02ratnakeu:849: athāyuṣmān subhūtir dhāvan gītasvareṇemā gāthā imāni ca mantrapadāni bhāṣate sma /

T02ratnakeu:857: tatra ca vīthīmadhye sthaviraḥ śāriputra uttarāmukho (Kurumiya 71) niṣaṇṇaḥ /
T02ratnakeu:862: teṣāṃ ca caturṇāṃ mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ madhye pṛthivīpradeśasya padmaṃ prādur abhavat paṃcāśad dhastavistāraṃ jāṃbūnadamayena daṇḍena nīlavaiḍūryamayaiḥ partaiḥ śrīgarbhamayena kesareṇa muktāmayyā karṇikayā /

T02ratnakeu:865: trayastriṃśatsu tat padmaṃ yojanaśatam uccatvena saṃdṛśyate sma yāvad akaniṣṭheṣu deveṣu tat padmam ardhayojanam uccatvena saṃdṛśyate sma /
T02ratnakeu:866: tasya ca padmasya patrebhyo nānārthapadāḥ ślokā niśceruḥ /

T02ratnakeu:872: ekākīha jagaddhetor āyāsyati na saṃśayaḥ // RKP_3.58
T02ratnakeu:873: vidvāṃsau bahunītiśāstrakuśalau dharmārthamokṣārthikau nītijñāv upatiṣyakaulitavarau śāstrā vinītāv iha /

T02ratnakeu:875: tryadhvajñānasudeśakaḥ śramaṇarāṭ chikṣātrayodbhāvakas trātā vai sanarāmarasya jagato dharmāprameyārthavit

T02ratnakeu:877: avidyayā nīvṛtalocanānāṃ saddharmacakṣuḥ pradadau yathāvat // RKP_3.61
T02ratnakeu:879: sarvāvatīyaṃ pariṣat samāgatā na cirād ihāyāsyati vādisiṃhaḥ /
T02ratnakeu:880: paramārthadarśī paramaṃ surūpo balair upeto hi parāparajñaḥ // RKP_3.62
T02ratnakeu:881: dṛṣṭvā jagad duḥkhamahārṇavastham āhaṃtum āyāsyati dharmadundubhim /

T02ratnakeu:886: yūyaṃ samagrā ratim adya bhuṃjatha pramattacittāḥ madatṛṣṇasaṃvṛtāḥ /
T02ratnakeu:887: sadā vimūḍhā ratipānamattā na pūjayadhvaṃ sugataṃ pramādāt // RKP_3.65
T02ratnakeu:890: aniḥsṛtānāṃ ratiṣu pramādināṃ na nirvṛtir jātu punar bhaviṣyati //
T02ratnakeu:891: sadā pramattā na śamāya yuktā na paśyata prāksukṛtaṃ śubhāśubhaṃ /

T02ratnakeu:894: utsṛjya kāmān aśucīn durantān upasaṃkramadhvaṃ sugataṃ śaraṇyaṃ //
T02ratnakeu:895: gatvā ca tasmād vacanaṃ śṛṇudhvaṃ subhāṣitaṃ tad dhi mahārthikaṃ ca /
T02ratnakeu:896: prajñāvimuktipraśamāya hetuḥ saddharmayuktaṃ śravaṇe mahārthaṃ // RKP_3.69
T02ratnakeu:897: yāvat ṣoḍaśasu devanikāyeṣu tasya padmasya patrebhyaḥ imā evaṃrūpā gāthā niśceruḥ //
T02ratnakeu:900: abhrāntacittāś ca vimokṣakāṃkṣiṇo dveṣaprahāṇāya matiṃ ca kṛdhvaṃ //
T02ratnakeu:902: tayaiva cātyantavimokṣam āśu saṃprāpsyatha vyādhijarāviyuktam // RKP_3.71
T02ratnakeu:903: śraddhās tu ye rūpavikalpasaṃcaye nityaṃ dhruvātmasthirabhāvadṛṣṭayaḥ /
T02ratnakeu:904: teṣāṃ na janmapravahasya hānir apāyabhūmipravaṇā hi te vai // RKP_3.72
T02ratnakeu:905: traidhātukaṃ vīkṣya sadā nirātmam nirdravyam asvaṃvaśikaṃ nirīhaṃ /

T02ratnakeu:907: teṣāṃ na mṛtyur na jarā na rogo na durgatir nāpriyasaṃprayogaḥ /

T02ratnakeu:910: atyantaśuddho hi varaḥ sa mārgo yeṣām asaṃgaṃ mana indriyeṣu /

T02ratnakeu:912: ekaṃ nayaṃ ye tu vibhāvayaṃti niṣkiṃcanaṃ sarvanimittavarjitaṃ /
T02ratnakeu:913: dvayaprahāṇāya vinītaceṣṭās teṣām ayaṃ mārgavaraḥ praṇītaḥ // RKP_3.76
T02ratnakeu:914: vibhāvya śūnyān iha sarvadharmān asvāmikāṅ kārakajātivṛttān /

T02ratnakeu:925: atha bhūyasyā matrayā māraḥ pāpīmān duḥkhito durmanā vipratisārī saṃhṛṣṭaromakūpaḥ prasvinnagātraḥ saṃprakaṃpitaśarīro gagane pradhāvan mahatā svareṇāparān mārān prakrośann evam āha /
T02ratnakeu:926: śṛṇu girim asamāṃ samavahitamanā na me vaśo svaviṣaye na ca balam iha me /
T02ratnakeu:927: idam iha munibalam atiguṇaviśadaṃ prasarati jagati sthirajanakaraṇam // RKP_3.78
T02ratnakeu:928: kamalam iha punar udayati nar'amaru dayitum upagata nikhilato sujanata niyatā /
T02ratnakeu:931: māyeyaṃ śramaṇena vartita iha trailokyasaṃmohanī sarve 'nanyamanā narāmaragaṇāḥ padmaṃ vitanya sthitāḥ /
T02ratnakeu:932: kṣipraṃ muṃcatha śailavṛṣṭim abhunā bhīṣmasvaraṃ rāviṇo gacchen nāśam ayaṃ yathādya nihato mārograsainyāyudhaiḥ // RKP_3.80
T02ratnakeu:934: śṛṇv asmākam idaṃ vaco hitakaraṃ vijñātadharmo 'si kiṃ yat paśyann api mārasainyavilayaṃ nāyāsi śāntiṃ tataḥ /
T02ratnakeu:935: bhrāntāḥ smaḥ prasamīkṣya saugatam idaṃ tejovapuḥ śrīdhanaṃ rūpaṃ nānyad ihottamaṃ suśaraṇaṃ buddhād ṛte nāyakāt // RKP_3.81
T02ratnakeu:936: athāparo māraḥ prarudan paramakrodhāviṣṭavadano māraṃ pāpīmantam eva āha /
T02ratnakeu:937: kumārgasaṃprasthita mārgahīna prajānase na svabalaṃ na śaktiṃ /

T02ratnakeu:945: pāpīmaṃs tvam apetadharmacaraṇaḥ pāpakriyāyāṃ rato nātho hy eṣa jagaddhitārthakuśalo buddhaḥ satām agraṇī /
T02ratnakeu:946: āyāmo nagaraṃ drutaṃ vayam iha prītiprasannekṣaṇāḥ gacchāmaḥ śaraṇaṃ trilokamahitaṃ sarvauṣadhaṃ prāṇināṃ // RKP_3.85
T02ratnakeu:947: atha tatraiva gagane ghoṣavatir nāma māraḥ sa uccasvareṇaivam āha /

T02ratnakeu:949: tyaktakrodhāḥ prahṛṣṭā munivaravacane sphītabhaktiprasādā gatvā buddhaṃ samakṣaṃ śaraṇam asulabhaṃ pūjayāmo 'dya bhaktyā // RKP_3.86
T02ratnakeu:950: atha tatkṣaṇam eva sarve mārā gaganatalād avatīrya rājagṛhanagaradvārāṇi saptaratnamayāni cakruḥ /
T02ratnakeu:951: kecin mārāś cakravartirājaveṣam ātmānam abhinirmīya bhagavataḥ pūjāparās tasthuḥ /
T02ratnakeu:984: kecid rājāmātyaveṣaṃ ātmānam abhinirmīya tasthur bhagavataḥ pūjākarmaṇe /
T02ratnakeu:985: kecin nīlā nīlavarṇāḥ śvetālaṃkārālaṃkṛtam ātmānam abhinirmīya bhagavataḥ pūjākarmaṇe lohitāṃ chatradhvajapatākāmuktāhārān dhārayantas tālapramāṇamātram uccatvena gaganatale tasthuḥ /
T02ratnakeu:986: kecid avadātā avadātavarṇābharaṇā maṃjiṣṭhavarṇābharaṇavibhūṣaṇāḥ pītāṃ chatradvajapatākān (Kurumiya 81)
T02ratnakeu:988: kecin maṃjiṣṭhā maṃjiṣṭhavarṇāḥ suvarṇābharaṇavibhūṣaṇā nīlāñ chatradhvajapatākān dhārayantas tasthuḥ /
T02ratnakeu:991: kecid devarṣivarṇam ātmānam abhinirmīya gaganāt puṣpavarṣam abhipravavarṣuḥ /
T02ratnakeu:992: kecid bhagavataḥ śrāvakaveṣaṃ ātmānam abhinirmīya nānādivyagandhavarṣaṃ gaganād vavarṣuḥ /
T02ratnakeu:994: kecid amarakanyāvarṇā nānāratnabhājaneṣu gandhodakaṃ dhārayaṃtaḥ pṛthivīṃ siṃciṣuḥ /
T02ratnakeu:997: kecin nānāvarṇā yena bhagavāṃs tena prāñjalayo bhagavantaṃ tuṣṭuvuḥ /
T02ratnakeu:998: kecin mārā mārapārṣadyā api yasyān diśi bhagavāṃs tad abhimukhā nānādyāni maṇiratnāni dadhrire bhagavataḥ pūjākarmaṇe /
T02ratnakeu:999: kecid vīthīgṛhaśaraṇagavākṣatoraṇaharmyacatvaraśṛṅgāṭakakūṭāgāradvāravṛkṣavimāneṣu sthitvā prāṃjalayo nyaṣedur bhagavataḥ pūjākarmaṇe /
T02ratnakeu:1000: atha sa māro yadādrākṣīt sarvāṃs tān mārān saparivārāṃ chramaṇaṃ gautamaṃ śaraṇam gatān tadā bhūyasyā mātrayā kṣubdhas trasto bhrāntaḥ prarudann evam āha /
T02ratnakeu:1002: na bhūyo me sahāyo 'sti naṣṭā śrīr me 'dya sarvataḥ /
T02ratnakeu:1003: bhraṣṭo 'smi māraviṣayāt kuryāṃ vīryaṃ hi paścimam // RKP_3.87
T02ratnakeu:1004: mūlāc chindyām ahaṃ padmaṃ sattvā yena diśo 'vrajan /
T02ratnakeu:1005: chedāt padmasya saṃbhrāntā etat syāt paścimaṃ balaṃ // RKP_3.88
T02ratnakeu:1006: iti saṃcintya māraḥ pāpīmāṃ vāyuvad avatīrya gaganād yena tat padmaṃ vīthīgataṃ tena prasṛtya tat padmam ā daṇḍād icchaty uddhartuṃ spraṣṭum api na śaśāka /
T02ratnakeu:1007: patrāṇi cchetum icchati na ca tāni dadarśa /
T02ratnakeu:1008: padmakarṇikām api pāṇinā parāhaṃtum icchati tām api naivopalebhe // tadyathā vidyud dṛśyate na copalabhyate /
T02ratnakeu:1009: tadyathā vā cchāyā dṛśyate na copalabhyate /
T02ratnakeu:1010: evam eva tat padmaṃ dṛśyate na copalabhyate /
T02ratnakeu:1011: yadā ca māraḥ pāpīmāṃs tat padmaṃ dadarśa na copalebhe na pasparśa /
T02ratnakeu:1012: atha punaḥ sarvaparṣatsaṃtrāsanārtham uccair mahābhairavaṃ svaraṃ moktum icchati tadāpi na śaśāka /
T02ratnakeu:1013: sa punar mahābalavegenobhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyām icchati mahāpṛthivīṃ parāhaṃtuṃ kaṃpayituṃ tām api spraṣṭum api na śaśāka naivopalebhe /
T02ratnakeu:1014: tadyathāpi nāma kaścid ākāśam icchet parāmarṣṭuṃ na copalebhe /
T02ratnakeu:1015: evam eva māraḥ pāpīmāṃ dadarśa pṛthivīṃ na ca pasparśa nopalebhe /
T02ratnakeu:1017: yan nv ahaṃ yathā sannipatitānāṃ sattvānāṃ prahārāṃ dadyāṃ cittavikṣepaṃ vā kuryām iti dadarśa tān sattvān na caikasattvam apy upalebhe na pasparśa /
T02ratnakeu:1018: atha bhūyasyā mātrayā māraḥ pāpīmān ruroda /
T02ratnakeu:1021: sāśrumukhaś caturdiśaṃ ca vyavalokayann evam āha /
T02ratnakeu:1022: māyaiṣā śramaṇena sarvajagato 'dyāvarjanārthaṃ kṛtā yenāhaṃ purato vimohita iva bhrāntiṃ gato 'smi kṣaṇāt /
T02ratnakeu:1023: bhraṣṭo 'haṃ viṣayāt svapuṇyabalataḥ kṣīṇaṃ ca me jīvitaṃ
T02ratnakeu:1024: śīghraṃ yāmi nirākṛtaḥ svabhavanaṃ yāvan na yāmi kṣayam // RKP_3.89

T02ratnakeu:2119: asti kulaputra vajrakhavasarī nāma bhūtānāṃ hṛdayaṃ mahācaṇḍadāruṇavidyāmantradhāraṇī yair maṃtrapadaiḥ prayuktair na bhūyaś kaścid yakṣo vā yakṣiṇī vā yakṣamahallako vā yakṣamahallikā vā yakṣadārako vā yakṣadārikā vā yakṣapārṣado yakṣapārṣadi vā rākṣaso vā rākṣasī vā yāvan nāgo vā nāgī vā kuṃbhāṇḍo vā kuṃbhāṇḍī vā ekāhiko vā yāvac caturthako vā pūtano vā kaṭapūtano vā kaṭapūtanā vā kaṭapūtanamahallako vā kaṭapūtanamahallikā vā kaṭapūtanapotako vā kaṭapūtanapotīkā vā kaṭapūtanapārṣado vā kaṭapūtanapārṣadī vā śaktāḥ kṣatriyasaṃkṣobhaṃ yāvaj janapadasaṃkṣobhaṃ vā kartum //
T02ratnakeu:2120: yatra punaḥ kulaputra gṛame vā nagare vā nigame vā yāvat kuṭumbikagṛhe vā asyā vajrakhavasaryāḥ sarvabhūtahṛdayāyāḥ mahācaṇḍadāruṇavidyāyāḥ mantrapadānāṃ prakāśanaṃ syāt tatra te duṣṭayakṣakaṭapūtanāḥ tāṃ pūrvavairānubaddhām (Kurumiya 169) akuśalakarmakṛyāṃ prajahuḥ /
T02ratnakeu:2122: tāṃś ca sarvān rāṣṭrakuṭuṃbadevanāgayakṣakaṭapūtanasaṃkṣobhāṃ sarvacandrasūryagrahanakṣatradaṇḍaviṣaśastrakākhordasaṃkṣobhāṃ chārirāṃś ca vātapittaśleṣmasannipātajvaraikāhikadvaitīyakatraitīyakacāturthakakuṣṭhamarjakaṇḍukāsavīsarpodaraśūlāṃgapratyaṃgavyādhisaṃkṣobhāṃ praśameyuḥ /
T02ratnakeu:2123: tatra ca manuṣyāmanuṣyān mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ śuklakarmāntābhiyuktāṃ sarvabhayaprahīṇān sarvasukhasaukhyasamanvitān rātriṃdivasātināmanakuśalāṃ dānadamasamyamābhiratān aklāntakāyacittāṃ bodhimārgaparyeṣaṇābhiyuktāṃ kuryuḥ //
T02ratnakeu:2125: sacet me kulaputrāḥ sarve buddhā bhagavanta eṣu mantrapadeṣu karmasiddhin dadyur adhiṣṭhiteṣur anumodeyur yad aham etāni sarvasaṃkṣobhapraśamanakarāṇi sarvaprasādakarāṇi sarvākuśalapakṣanivārakāṇi sarvakuśalapakṣavivardhanāni sarvabhūtakhavasarīmaṃtrapadāni bhāṣitā /
T02ratnakeu:2126: adhitiṣṭhatu me śākyamunis tathāgataḥ svaramaṇḍalavāgvyāhāraṃ yad ahaṃ kṛtsnam idaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ svaramaṇḍalavāgvyāhārākṣararutenāpūrayitvā etāṃ yathāsannipātāṃ parṣadaṃ svaramaṇḍalavāgvyāhārārthapadavyaṃjanaiḥ paritoṣayeyam //
T02ratnakeu:2128: atha khalu śakyamunis tathāgata āṭavakaṃ mahāyakṣasenāpatim āmantrayaivam āha /
T02ratnakeu:2129: adhiṣṭhitas te kulaputrair buddhair bhagavadbhiḥ svaramaṇḍalavāgvyāhāraḥ asyā vajrakhavasaryāḥ sarvabhūtahṛdayāyā maṃtradhāraṇyāḥ kṛṣṇapakṣavidrāpaṇāya śuklapakṣajvālanāya /
T02ratnakeu:2130: utsaha tvaṃ satpuruṣa vadasvemāni saṃkṣobhapraśamanakāryā vajrakhavasaryāḥ sarvabhūtahṛdayamantradhāraṇyāḥ sarvaduṣṭanivāraṇāni mantrapadāni //
T02ratnakeu:2131: athāṭavako mahāyakṣasenāpatir utthāyāsanād yena śākyamunis tathāgatas tenāṃjaliṃ praṇāmya kṛtsnam idaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ svareṇābhivijñapayati sma /
T02ratnakeu:2132: imāni ca mantrapadāni bhāṣate sma // tadyathā /
T02ratnakeu:2154: hiri hiri hiri hiri hiri hiri /
T02ratnakeu:2158: buddhi li pravarā sṛṣṭhaloka caryājine jine /
T02ratnakeu:2160: yatra yatraiva bhagavan grāme vā nagare vā yāvat kuṭuṃbikagṛhe vā asyāṃ sarvabhūtahṛdayavajrakhavasaryāṃ mahāmantrapadavidyāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ ye tatra duṣṭayakṣā yāvad duṣṭakaṭapūtanāḥ na cittaṃ prasādayiṣyaṃti na ca kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ śikṣāsaṃvaraṃ pratigrahīṣyaṃti na ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ (Kurumiya 171) antike maitracittam upasthāpayiṣyaṃti teṣām arthāyāhaṃ bhūyo dāruṇatarāṇi mantrapadāni bhāṣiṣye // tadyathā //
T02ratnakeu:2170: hiri hiri hiri hiri hiri hiri /
T02ratnakeu:2186: samanantarabhāṣitā cāṭavakena mahāyakṣasenāpatinā imāni mantrapadāny atha tāvad eva sarve devanāgayakṣakaṭapūtanāḥ kṣubdhās trastā iha sakale buddhakṣetre kṣitigaganasthāḥ pracakaṃpire atha tatkṣaṇād eva sarveṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ purataḥ prāṃjalayas triṣkṛtvā evam āhuḥ /
T02ratnakeu:2188: paramadāruṇāny etāni anenātavakena mahāyakṣasenāpatinā sarvabhūtahṛdayāvakrāntimaṃtrapadāni bhāṣitāni // //
T02ratnakeu:2189: mahāsannipātān mahāyānasūtrād ratnaketuparivartād dvādaśama āṭavakaparivartaḥ samāptāḥ //
T02ratnakeu:2191: atha khalu te sarve buddhā bhagavantaḥ sveṣu sveṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gagananimittāni pradarśayām āsuḥ pratyutthānanimittāni ca /
T02ratnakeu:2192: atha tāvad eva sarvāvatīyaṃ parṣā kṣitigaganasthāś ca sattvāḥ pracakaṃpire /
T02ratnakeu:2197: sarvaṃ cedaṃ buddhakṣetram avabhāsena sphuṭam abhūt /
T02ratnakeu:2199: atha khalu brahmā sahāṃpatir mahācandanagandhaṃ tathāgataṃ papraccha /
T02ratnakeu:2200: kiyatā bhagavaṃ kuśalamūlena te samanvāgatā bhaviṣyaṃti katibhir vā dharmair adhiṣṭhitās te sattvā bhaviṣyaṃti buddhair bhagavadbhir ye 'nāgate 'dhvanīmaṃ dharmaparyāyam udgrahīṣyaṃti dhārayiṣyaṃti // evam ukte bhagavāṃ sa mahācandanagandhas tathāgatas taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ sahāṃpatim etad avocat /
T02ratnakeu:2201: yathaiva brahmaṃ ṣaḍdhātavaḥ sarvabuddhair adhiṣṭhitā mārapakṣavigrahārthaṃ sarvakaliyugapraśamārthaṃ sarvasattvaparipākārthaṃ saddharmanetryāś cirasthityarthaṃ mārgaviśuddhyartham /
T02ratnakeu:2202: evaṃ sarvabuddhabodhisattvair daśabhir dharmais te sattvā adhiṣṭhitā ye 'nāgate
T02ratnakeu:2204: katamair daśabhir (Kurumiya 173) yad uteha brahmaṃs te sattvāḥ sarvabuddhabodhisattvaiḥ sarveṣāṃ devanāgayakṣagandharvarākṣasakuṃbhāṇḍānāṃ nyāyataḥ parittā nityakālaṃ yuṣmābhi rakṣitavyāḥ /
T02ratnakeu:2205: anarthāt pratinivārayitavyāḥ kuśale kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇi niyojayitavyā udārānnapānopabhogaparibhogārogyakauśalyenātmajīvitaparityāgenāpi te sattvāḥ sandhārayitavyā nirdoṣāṇi ca teṣāṃ smṛtimatigatipratibhānakauśalyāni bhaviṣyaṃti na ca taiḥ kāmaguṇasaṃsaktair manaḥsaṃkalpair vihariṣyaṃti /
T02ratnakeu:2207: dharaṇisamacittāḥ gambhīrakṣāntisamanvāgatāḥ saṃgrahavastūdyuktāś ca te bhaviṣyaṃti /
T02ratnakeu:2208: kuśaladharmāvasthitāḥ sattvāḥ pariṣat kāyādattasārāḥ trivastupariśuddhā bodhicaryām uttariṣyaṃti
T02ratnakeu:2209: ratnadhvajaṃ samādhiṃ pratilapsyante yena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu vyavacārajñānakuśalā bhaviṣyaṃti
T02ratnakeu:2210: maraṇakālasamaye ca te sattvāḥ purastād aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān buddhān bhagavataḥ bhikṣugaṇaparivṛtāṃ bodhisattvagaṇapuraskṛtāṃ tiṣṭhato yāpayato dharman deśayamānān drakṣyaṃti
T02ratnakeu:2211: / teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikāt tādṛśam arthapadavyaṃjanopetaṃ dharman deśyamānaṃ śroṣyaṃti /
T02ratnakeu:2212: yat sarvaviśiṣṭam āryaṃ nirāmiṣaprītiprāmodyaṃ pratilabdhāḥ sarvaṃ tat karmāvaraṇam akuśalaṃ
T02ratnakeu:2214: sarvābhiprāyeṇa ca pariśuddheṣu buddhakṣetreṣv aupapādika upapatsyaṃte /
T02ratnakeu:2215: yeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanto yāpayantaḥ śuddhāṃ mahāyānakathāṃ deśaṃti teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu te sattvās tair mahāyānasaṃprasthitair anāvaraṇajñānasamanvāgatair gaganasamacittaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvasiṣyaṃti /
T02ratnakeu:2216: na cireṇaiva tair guṇaiḥ samanvāgatā bhaviṣyaṃti /
T02ratnakeu:2217: na ca te sattvā bhūyaḥ kliṣṭe paṃcakaṣāye buddhakṣetre upapatsyaṃte
T02ratnakeu:2219: ebhir daśabhir dharmair adhiṣṭhitās te sattvā buddhair bhagavadbhir bhaviṣyaṃti ya etarhi 'nāgate 'py adhvanīmāṃ saddharmanetrīm ujjvālayiṣyaṃti imaṃ ca dhāraṇīmudrādharmaparyāyam udgrahīṣyaṃti yāvat
T02ratnakeu:2221: sarvabuddhabodhisattvādhiṣṭhitās te sarvopakleśavinirmuktā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyantīti
T02ratnakeu:2222: atha bhagavāṃ chākyamunis tathāgataḥ śakrabrahmalokapālān āmantrayati sma
T02ratnakeu:2223: / ye kecid iha mārṣā buddhā bhagavanto daśabhyo digbhyaḥ samāgatāḥ sarvair yuṣmatkāruṇyārtham iha lokadhātau bāhyabhāvaviśodhanārthaṃ sattvaparipākāya bodhicaryāpradarśanārthaṃ mārapakṣaparājayāya
T02ratnakeu:2224: dharmadhvajocchrepaṇāya sakalabuddhakāryopadarśanāya triratnavaṃśānupacchedāya sarvavyādhipraśamanāya sarvaduṣṭanivāraṇāya sarvabhayārakṣāyai sarvakudṛṣṭiprahāṇāya (Kurumiya 175)
T02ratnakeu:2226: evaṃrūpa āścaryādbhuto 'śrutapūrvo gaṃbhīradhāraṇīpadapraveśavyākaraṇo dharmaparyāyo bhāṣitaḥ yena gṛhagrāmanagaraviṣayārakṣā yāvac
T02ratnakeu:2227: cāturdvīpikārakṣā devanāgayakṣamanuṣyāmanuṣyārakṣā dhānyauṣadhapatrapuṣpaphalasasyārakṣā dharmabhāṇakānāṃ dharmaśrāvaṇikānāṃ cārakṣā bhavaty asaṃgadhāraṇīpratilābhāya ākāśasamajñānāvatārāya ekanayasarvajñajñānapratilābhāya asmiṃ khalu punar mārṣā dharmaparyāye ebhir buddhair bhagavadbhir iha buddhakṣetre ekaiko bhāvo mahākaruṇāvatārajñānaniṣyandair daśabhiḥ prakārair adhiṣṭhitaḥ /
T02ratnakeu:2228: sarvabuddhabodhisattvair idaṃ mārṣā buddhakṣetram akhilaṃ paribhuktaṃ sarvakuśaladharmādhiṣṭhānāya
T02ratnakeu:2229: sarvabuddhakṣetropapannānām idaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ caityabhūtaṃ gurusthānīyaṃ śāstṛsaṃmataṃ namaskaraṇīyaṃ saṃvṛttaṃ yatra hi nāmeha paṃcānantaryakāriṇām apy akuśaladharmasamanvāgatānāṃ tat karmāvaraṇam aniṣṭhaphalaṃ niravaśeṣaṃ parikṣayaṃ gacchati /
T02ratnakeu:2230: sarve ca te prahīṇakarmāvaraṇāḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu pratiṣṭhante /
T02ratnakeu:2233: iha buddhakṣetre satkṛtya mārṣā yuṣmābhir ayaṃ dharmaḥ parigṛhītavyo rakṣitavyaḥ /
T02ratnakeu:2234: saddharmadhārakāś ca gṛhasthapravrajitāḥ pudgalāḥ dharmapratipannāś ca rakṣitavyāḥ /
T02ratnakeu:2237: atha khalu kusumadhvajas tathāgatas tasyāṃ velāyām asya dharmaparyāyasya guṇānuśaṃsaprarūpaṇārtham evam āha /
T02ratnakeu:2238: sarvakṣetra saṃprapūrya kāṃcanena tāyiṣu prapūjanāya nāyakeṣu saṃsṛjed ya eva tad /
T02ratnakeu:2239: idaṃ tu yaḥ pradhānasūtram uttamaṃ hi dhārayet sa puṇyam aprameyam evam āpnuyād viśāradaḥ atha khalu ratnacchatraśrīs tathāgato 'py evam āha /
T02ratnakeu:2240: datvā svarṇaniṣkāṃ gaṃgānadīsikatopamāṃ munivṛṣabhebhyaḥ prāpnoti puṇyam evaṃ yathā samuddiśya sūtram idam //
T02ratnakeu:2241: atha khalu girikūṭas tathāgato 'py evam āha /
T02ratnakeu:2242: ākāśaṃ chādayitvā varakusumacayacchatrasaṃghātameghair buddhebhyaḥ saṃpradadyāt pramuditasumanāḥ pūjanārthaṃ hi kaścit /
T02ratnakeu:2243: yaḥ paścāt kṣīṇakāle pratibhayarabhase dhārayet sūtram etat puṇyasyāsya pramāṇaṃ na khalu kathayituṃ sarvasattvo 'pi śaktaḥ //
T02ratnakeu:2244: atha khalu bhagavān api śākyamunis tathāgata evam āha /
T02ratnakeu:2245: vartiṃ merupramāṇāṃ purata iha mune gandhatailāvasiktāṃ dīpasyojjvālya bhaktyā vikasitavadano dhārayet kalpakoṭyaḥ /
T02ratnakeu:2246: yaḥ kaścit puṇyakāmo nivaraṇatanutāṃ prārthayan yas tv ihānyaḥ sūtraṃ prakṣīṇakāleṣu sadasi kathayet puṇyam asmād viśiṣṭam // RKP_13.3
T02ratnakeu:2247: atha khalv akṣobhyas tathāgato 'py evam āha /
T02ratnakeu:2248: kṣāntiṃ yaś ca vibhāvayet matidharo vīryaṃ sadā cārabhen nityaṃ dhyānaparaḥ samāhitatanuḥ prajñāṃ ca visphārayet /
T02ratnakeu:2250: kṣīṇe yas tv iha dhārayet kaliyuge saddharmamudrām imām eṣā kṣāntir idaṃ ca vīryam asamaṃ prajñā ca tasyātulā // RKP_13.4
T02ratnakeu:2251: atha khalu virajabalavikrāmī tathāgato 'py evam āha /
T02ratnakeu:2253: grāhayitvā parān yuktyā vācayitvā punaḥ sadā // RKP_13.5
T02ratnakeu:2255: yat puṇyaṃ samavāpnoti na tac chakyaṃ prakīrtitum // RKP_13.6
T02ratnakeu:2257: atha khalu te 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyā buddhā bhagavanto 'sya sūtrasyāprameyāṃ varṇaguṇānuśaṃsān udīrayitvā śakrabrahmalokapālān āhūyaivam ūcuḥ //
T02ratnakeu:2258: udgṛhṇīdhvaṃ mārṣā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sarvakarmāvaraṇakleśakṣayaṃkaraṃ yasya paścātkāle śravaṇamātreṇāpi sattvānāṃ sarvakarmāvaraṇakleśakṣayo bhaviṣyati // idam avocad bhagavān /
T02ratnakeu:2259: āttamanā sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandat mahāsannipātān mahāyānasūtrād ratnaketuniṣṭhāgamaparivartas trayodaśamaḥ samāptāḥ // //
T02ratnakeu:2262: saṃskṛtvā ratnaketuṃ pracurabhayaharān dhāraṇīṃ yan mayāgryaṃ puṇyaṃ kiṃcit prasūtaṃ pramuditamanasā sarvabhaktyādṛtena /
T02ratnakeu:2263: sarvo 'yaṃ tena loko munivacanakathālaṃkṛtāṃ ratnaketuṃ hy etām eva sphuṭārthām atiguṇaviśadāṃ prāpnuyāt sadya eva : // //
